title: Riven Q Idea
body: I was thinking of an idea for Riven's Q. Similar to Nidalee's W (cougar form), when you press Q to dash, it goes toward the cursor instead of where you last clicked. It can feel a bit clunky sometimes using the current Q causing me to dash the wrong way sometimes. This is just my opinion, what does everyone else think?

replies.body: simple, get it through ur head u rightclick then q lol
Yeah I know, I just think it will be a bit smoother.
no it really wont, this abilite is strong the way it works now was actually a nerf a long time ago lol
I'm not saying you're wrong, it's just my opinion and preference.
I think you just need to git gud the skill is fine as it is
Maybe haha, I sometimes go the wrong way on the first dash, I'm probably pressing Q before I click or something.

She will Q to cursor when it hovers over target.
